text: Can you check my account balance, please?
Sure, may I have your account information for authentication?
Your balance is 1935.44. Anything else I can help you with?
I want to open a new bank account.
Okay. What should be the account identifier, password, and account holder's name?
The account identifier is newaccount, the password is newpassword, and the account holder's name is John Doe.
Sure, I will open a new bank account for you.
Your account has been created successfully. Anything else I can help you with?
Can you check the stock price of Netflix on February 16, 2022?
Sure, what is the stock code of Netflix?
The stock price of Netflix on February 16, 2022 was 603.1 USD. Anything else I can help you with?
